comment_body:
Wow. Just wow.

You could pretty much predict the ending from the very first sentence, but you wrote it so creepy, it definitely makes up for it.
"It's not unhealthy" well, at least for one of us I guess ;)
If you'd like, we could chat privately and I could tell you about my dark and distressing inspiration for the short tale.
Thank you for your compliment! I notice that I write the best at 4 am.
